resources.string: Annotated strings can be Bold, Italic, or Underlined
Custom AnnotationHandlers can support things like colors, e.g.: Red, Green, & Blue
Placeholders are also filled with args such as Count = %1$d and as a Percent = %2$.4f %%

plurals.name: annotated_simple_defaults
plurals.item: Many items remain, there\'s still time to act

plurals.name: annotated_with_args
plurals.item: %d items remain, there\'s still time to act
